title: BJU Cuba Flag T-Shirt Graphic Tee Printed Crewneck Short Sleeve Fashion Casual Tops for Men and Women
description: Material: Polyester; This material is wrinkle-resistant, comfortable and elastic, breathable and skin-friendly, providing you with a good wearing experience!
Design: Printed pattern on front and back, round neck, double-needle cuffs, comfortable shaping, classic fit, comfortable fabric; keep you comfortable all day long!
Surprise Present: If you love the country of Cuba, then this awesome Cuban flag T-shirt is suitable for you! Also a surprise birthday present for parents, brothers, sisters, friends, teenagers.
Occasion: Suitable choice for daily wear, casual outings, going out, at home, street wear, dates, vacations and more!
Washing Instructions: Hand/machine wash, hang dry, do not bleach.
